name: The Last Hentai - Miku
description:
Miku

A third-person girl named Miku move to a new village. Miku has to learn how to fight agains enemies and has to increase her ability about fighting. While she increase her power she will encounter with different hard enemies. After she become more powerful, no one can stop her in the town.

All characters are over the age of 18.

Key features

  • User-friendly and intuitive combat controls
  • 9 Different bosses
  • Nude options for the character Miku
  • Advanced AI
  • Missions
  • Lots of different combat effects
